column2: §M(ED:MP)§! Player

This character is an §Yactive or absent human player§! and, as such, receives special treatment from some aspects of the §M(ED:MP)§! mod.

This §Yinheritable§! flag is automatically added to all human players on game load.

It can also be added to or removed from arbitrary AI characters by an administrator (multiplayer host, or the human character in single-player).
§M(ED:MP)§! Administrator

This character is the current §Yadministrator§! (the only single-player human, or the host character in multiplayer).

This flag doesn't grant any special privileges in the §M(ED:MP)§! mod - it is §Ypurely cosmetic§!.

This §Yinheritable§! flag is automatically added to the relevant character on game load, and it cannot be changed while the game is in progress.
§M(ED:MP)§! Admin Helper

This character has been granted special privileges by the current §M(ED:MP)§! §YAdministrator§!, meaning that they can perform many of the powerful "interference" actions added by the §M(ED:MP)§! mod.\n\nThis §Yinheritable§! flag must be approved by the §YAdministrator§! on game load, and it can be added or removed by the §YAdministrator§! at any time.
(ED:MP) Show "Player Flag" decisions

This mod includes a feature whereby §YAbsent Players§! are flagged, so that they can be treated differently to other AI characters.

It also allows human characters to be designated as §YAdmin Helpers§!, so that they can help the §YAdministrator§! (you) to resolve in-game issues.

The various "Player Flag" §P(ED:MP:PF)§! decisions (both targetted and self-targetted) allow you to manage these §YAbsent Player§! and §YAdmin Helper§! flags.
The §P(ED:MP:PF)§! targetted and self-targetted decisions will now be visible

(ED:MP) "Admin Helper" privileges ENABLED - Disable them?

This mod includes a feature whereby the §YAdministrator§! (single-player human or multiplayer host) can designate other playable characters as §YAdmin Helpers§!.

In a multiplayer game, these §YAdmin Helpers§! are granted §Yspecial incredibly-powerful privileges§!, which enable them to resolve most issues instead of the §YAdministrator§!.

This decision allows the §YAdministrator§! to suspend and re-enable §Yall Admin Helper privileges§!.
(ED:MP) "Admin Helper" privileges DISABLED - Enable them?

This mod includes a feature whereby the §YAdministrator§! (single-player human or multiplayer host) can designate other playable characters as §YAdmin Helpers§!.

In a multiplayer game, these §YAdmin Helpers§! are granted §Yspecial incredibly-powerful privileges§!, which enable them to resolve most issues instead of the §YAdministrator§!.

This decision allows the §YAdministrator§! to suspend and re-enable §Yall Admin Helper privileges§!.
The §Y(ED:MP) Check Admin Helpers§! event is NOT visible, or it has been visible for 6 in-game months
§P(ED:MP:PF)§! Flag As §MPlayer§!
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] (and [Root.GetHerHis] successors) is flagged as an absent human player.
§P(ED:MP:PF)§! Unflag As §MPlayer§!
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] is no longer flagged as an absent human player.
§P(ED:MP:PF)§! Unflag An AI §MPlayer§!
The selected AI character is no longer flagged as an absent human player.
§P(ED:MP:PF)§! Unflag All AI §MPlayers§!
All AI characters are no longer flagged as absent human players.
§P(ED:MP:PF)§! Flag As §PAdmin Helper§!

[Root.GetTitledFirstName] (and [Root.GetHerHis] successors) is designated as an §YAdmin Helpers§!, and will be granted §Yspecial incredibly-powerful privileges§! so that [Root.GetSheHe] can help the §YAdministrator§! to resolve any issues that may arise.
§P(ED:MP:PF)§! Unflag As §PAdmin Helper§!
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] (and [Root.GetHerHis] successors) is no longer designated as an §YAdmin Helpers§!.
§P(ED:MP:PF)§! Unflag An §PAdmin Helper§!
The selected character is no longer designated as an §YAdmin Helpers§!.
